text: Foods are great, service is good. One of the best Asian cuisine in the area.

There was steel wool in my mashed potatoes. I hadnt noticed until it was in my mouth. I didn't complain because I was with friends. Totally freaked me out and could have been dangerous.

Support 'Breast Cancer Awareness Month' in October by buying a 'Breast Cancer awareness bagel' !  Supporting breast cancer has never been easier on your tongue!

To those drivers using the park as a thru way, please slow down! And please don't have road rage at those of us that slow down and go the speed limit. There are runners, walkers, bikers, and deer, please go 25!

This PNC branch now has the debit card machine.  Meaning they can print you a debit card if you lose yours in about 10 minutes. $7 charge after the first time.  This is great for adhd minds. Lol

It was a beautiful morning for 7 miles:)

Poochies in the pool was a blast! Held on Labor Day, the pups get to swim in the pool. Hope it becomes a yearly thing, total blast!

Took our new puppy for his first visit there. Staff was phenomenal with him. Friendly and helpful. Just terrific people working there doing their best to help pets and people. They rock!
Amazing pizza. Everything else is just ok.
Best pedicure I've ever had. Amazing massage and Friendly staff.
So sorry to see it's closed - we loved this restaurant-  it was a city restaurant in the burbs!
Good food with awesome views!

Stop. Changing. The. Menu. Constantly.

I can think of 4 things we used to really love on the menu that are gone.  I understand Changing the menu and adding new seasonal items but it seems like they are constantly removing items. You go one week and they have something, you go two weeks later and they no longer have it.
Mostly unused large atrium like space with wifi in the meeting room in the back.  Excellent for presentations and group meetings

Try their salads!  Fresh, tasty and very large portions
Their rolls on special each day are the best!! Must try.

13 laps is equal to 1 mile!  The track is too short for the limited gps tracking so you have to record your pace the old fashioned way.
this place is closed

Download the Coupons App (free in Google Play). Veterans get a free haircut November 11th. Nice way to say thanks, though we can never say thanks enough.

I know you're excited to start the wedding planning process. I get it. BUT, having been a bride, and having sold wedding gowns and formalwear, I'm telling you, please wait to dress shop no more than 9 months before the wedding. Your weight WILL change, and not always for the better. Please save yourself (and your poor wedding party, family and sales associate) the stress of ridiculous weight loss expectations to squeeze into a dress you fell for a year or more earlier.
Poochies in the pool, $20 to register at the gate for 1 dog and 1 human. Preregister and it is cheaper. Benefited Paws across Pittsburgh. And so worth it!
A great day for 2 loops :)
You can sit out on the patio all year in an enclosed HEATED, tented section. So cozy and romantic!
42 from silver...
Best place on earth!
Some of the best sushi around and I love the fusion dishes!
Watch out their mustard is super spicy, but yummy!
Try the Grist house 'Hazedellic' !  Good stuff!
There are biking and hiking trails nearby; convenient place to unwind....just don't expect great service. Best bet: bring a picnic...very romantic!
Between the rain and the race, you might want to wait. The parking lot in front of boathouse is closed until around 11 (race). Park across the street. Try 'em for breakfast!
Love a run around the lake
Know a blind or visually impaired friend who loves nature and or hiking ?  Check out the visually impaired 'Braille trail' on the northern end of the park!
Try the Apple Cider Sangria (seasonal). Very tasty
Hello Wild Sage customers! Unfortunately our heat is not working properly in the building today so we will be closed for lunch. Sorry for any inconvenience and have a great day!
Looking forward to another busy night like lastnight! Get your reservations in now! We are open 4:30-10. Hope to see you all tonight:) Thank You for all of the wonderful support the past few months.
We will be open Sunday February 14th for Valentine's Day!! Get your reservations in now, it will fill up quick
Waited far too long for bad service and bad food.
Freshly remodeled. Major overhaul!  Keep an eye out for the grand re-opening sale flyer!
Place is dirty and dank looking, owner is extremely rude! Avoid at all costs.
If you haven't already please don't forget to stop in and try our new casual menu! You will not be disappointed with all of the smoked meats!
Valentine's Day is right around the corner! Don't forget to make reservations
We are open for lunch Monday-Friday at 11:30! Stop by and enjoy a great sandwich, pasta or salad with your friends & co-workers.
Great food, long wait.
Check out our new website @ wildsagert8.com

Hello Friends! We are working with Google to get all of the "extra" menus off of there. But to help you out, please just go directly to www.wildsagert8.com
You will there find our new, updated menu. We apologize for all of the confusion. Thank you for your patience while we work on this.
Our liquor license is finally here!!! Come sit at the bar or diningroom and enjoy your favorite cocktail with your favorite meal!!!
Love the rolls here. Best in the north hills

Our new Fall dinner is here! We call this one our "comfort" food menu!! Several different stews...pastas...& our famous Apple Cider Braised Pork Shank is back!! Along with many different options on our lunch menu!!
Boat rentals start up again on May 26!
This will be the last week to order Walleye! Unfortunately it is no longer in season! Chef will be adding his amazing Salmon Roulades back onto the menu!

Our new Fall "Comfort" Foods menu will be starting Friday at 5:00!!!  Stop in tomorrow to get the last of the smoked meats!! Everyone's favorite Pork Shank will be returning plus Chef Matt's amazing stews...and many many more delicious dishes! Hope to see all of your smiling faces tomorrow!
Come in and join us in watching the STEELERS beat the TITANS tonight!!! Still Byob so bring your favorite bottle of wine..liquor or beer!!
We will be open for Mothers Day from 2-8. We still have reservations left. Also..our new menu will be featured on this day. So be the first to try it out!!!

Try to call for a reservation first, she will write your name on a table, so it's open when you get there. Love this place for so many reasons.  Did it for a girls night out.  BYOB and food, we painted pottery, fun night.
We will be open for New Year's Eve!!! 4:30-10 come ring in the New Year early at Wild Sage! Hurry & get your reservations in quick because it will fill up fast!
Good service excellent food!
Hope everyone had a great Thanksgiving! We will be closing for lunch today! Open for dinner at 4:00. Call and make your reservations now.
Flea market and cook out until 2 p.m. Today. Everything benefits the Children's Miracle Network. Lots of used books for sale as well!

We will be open Sunday May 10th for Mothers Day!!! Our new spring menu will also be presented on this day. 
(412)486-1800
Wildsagert8@gmail.com

Hi Friends! For some reason if you try to make a reservation on the weekend it says we are full! We are not full! We are still working on the problem through Yelp. Please set-up a reservation through our

or through our

Thank you for your patience while we continue to fix this problem!

For some reason they are not taking delivery orders tonight.
Come warm up with Chef Matt's potato leek soup! And enjoy a caramel kiss martini. We also have a berry rumchata after dinner drink! Yum
Reservations are highly suggested but not necessary! Reserve your table now through the Yelp reservations or call (412) 486-1800

Image nail is a cute little place to get your nails done! The wait was a little long, but it's the day before the 4th of July so I suspect it would be busy. The people are very kind!

Absoltuely my go to pizza after a long day at work.  You won't be disappointed !!   The staff is extremely friendly, the pizza is to die for.  We typically get a traditional pizza for the kids and a slightly fancy "specialty pizza" for me and husband.  Everyone is happy, fed quickly & not clean up!
Great atmosphere and delicious food especially the burgers.

Go somewhere else FAST!! went for inspection - told me I needed rear brakes for $600!!! I said I'm coming to get car - they said they broke a brake pad looking at it and I can't drive car!! $600 period! After multiple arguments I had to pay $150 for the pad they broke so I could get car back!! btw they also broke a brake sensor on purpose!! FYI new mechanic said I don't need brakes or rotors!! Monroe scum bag liars!!

Honest guys!! Highly recommend! great prices! quick service! It's Hard to find trustworthy mechanic! My mechanic retired - went to 4 others before finding these guys!! I would give 20 stars if I could!

The Wednesday drink special is $3 well drinks. The owner, Greg, lied and overcharged us. When we asked him about it, he blamed the waitress, who was wonderful. He ripped us off, and this is not the first time this has happened. I would highly recommend never coming to this place.
